name: MARCELLO PIMENTEL ZANANDREA
title: Front-End Developer
summary: I'm a Mid-Level React Developer with 4 years of experience in React and TypeScript, working with remote teams on scalable applications and large design system transitions. I'm driven by creating real-world solutions that serve a meaningful purpose, focusing on applications that people genuinely use and find valuable. My strong analytical mindset, shaped by a background in Electrical Engineering, supports my goal of contributing to remote teams that are building thoughtful and impactful user experiences.

experience.description: Contributed to the migration of front-end components to a modernized design system across dozens of repositories for FloQast, a leading US-based accounting SaaS provider. Engineered and implemented complex, accessible, and themeable UI components using React and Styled Components, enhancing developer experience and visual consistency. Actively participated in code reviews, technical discussions, and agile ceremonies in a fully English-speaking environment, contributing to high-quality code standards.

Led the front-end development of a new internal platform for managing cloud identity tenants and licenses, utilizing React and TypeScript. Designed and implemented intuitive user interfaces with complex CRUD operations and hierarchical data visualization for distributors and resellers. Executed the complete migration of a major application codebase from JavaScript to TypeScript, refactoring approximately 150 files to improve type safety and significantly enhance developer productivity. Developed and maintained user-friendly interfaces for cloud entity monitoring systems, collaborating closely with backend and product teams.

Contributed to multiple projects as a Front-End React developer, resulting in improved user interface performance and enhanced user satisfaction through optimized design practices. Collaborated with team members to create user-friendly components and improve system performance. Enhanced technical skills in React, JavaScript, and front-end best practices within a professional environment.

Gained foundational backend experience contributing to projects using PHP and the Symfony framework. Developed server-side logic for CRUD operations and created front-end templates using Twig. Acquired practical skills in backend development principles and solidified preference for front-end specialization.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering

personal_projects.name: RPG Campaign Manager
personal_projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web application for managing tabletop RPG campaigns using React, TypeScript, and Firebase, hosted on Vercel. Implemented features including Markdown text editing, inventory management, and character sheet creation within a responsive, OneNote-inspired layout. Engineered distinct public (shared) and private (player-specific) sections within campaigns to manage information access effectively.

personal_projects.name: League of Legends Match Customization & Analytics
personal_projects.description: Created a personalized platform for balancing custom League of Legends matches and tracking player/team statistics using React, Firebase Realtime Database, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. Automated previously manual processes for team balancing and calculation of win rates and performance metrics. Implemented user authentication and permission handling to manage access to personalized player data.

personal_projects.name: Real-Time Tabletop Game Platform
personal_projects.description: Developing a responsive and accessible platform for real-time tabletop games like Tic Tac Toe, Poker, and Dominoes using React, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, TanStack Query, and Zustand for state management. The Go backend provides real-time communication via WebSockets and REST APIs. Includes live chat, multiplayer support, and end-to-end testing with Playwright. Designed with mobile-first responsiveness and accessibility best practices to ensure an inclusive experience across devices.

personal_projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
personal_projects.description: Designed and developed a clean, responsive personal portfolio using React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my work experience, personal and professional projects, and the technologies I specialize in. Focused on simplicity, performance, and ease of navigation to provide a smooth user experience. Highlights include a dynamic project gallery, tech stack overview, and clear presentation of my development background.

hero_section.greeting: I'm a React Developer focused on creating meaningful user experiences and building applications with real-world value.

contact_section.title: Get in Touch
contact_section.intro_text: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out!
